text: Fu Cheong () is one of the 25 constituencies in the Sham Shui Po District of Hong Kong which was created in 2003. The constituency loosely covers Fu Cheong Estate in Nam Cheong with the estimated population of 18,766. == Councillors represented == {| class="wikitable" |- !colspan="2"|Election!!Member!!Party |- |style="background-color: " | | 2003 | Tracy Lai Wai-lan | ADPL |- |style="background-color:" | | 2011 | rowspan=3| Scott Leung Man-kwong | NCERA |- |style="background-color: " | | 2012 | KWND |- |style="background-color: " | | 2015 | BPA/KWND |- |style="background-color: " | | 2019 | Wong Kit-long | CSWWF |- |} == Election results == ===2010s=== ===2000s=== ==References== Category:Constituencies of Hong Kong Category:Constituencies of Sham Shui Po District Council Category:2003 establishments in Hong Kong Category:Constituencies established in 2003 Category:Nanchang
title: Fu Cheong (constituency)
